html:
3i Group plc, UK-based private equity firm, has agreed to acquire Dutch Bakery B.V., a Netherlands-based producer of baking bake-off breads and pastries, from Egeria Capital Management B.V, for a consideration of EUR55 million (USD64.47 million)

Houthoff Cooperatief UA is acting as legal advisor and Rothschild is acting as financial advisor to Egeria.

Deal In Brief

Deal Value (US$ Million)64.48
Deal TypePrivate Equity
Sub-CategoryInstitutional Buy-out (IBO)
Deal StatusAnnounced: 2021-09-20

Deal Participants

Target (Company)Dutch Bakery B.V.

Deal Rationale
